title: august 26: women’s equality day!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about why we celebrate women’s equality day on august 26th. After, Maia revisits the release of Britney Spears’ most recent album, Glory. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
